long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to "Factopia" â€“ your gateway to a world of fascinating facts! This delightful Chrome extension brings you a new, intriguing fact with each click. Uncover the mysteries of our planet and beyond, from the amazing to the bizarre.
